context_evidences: - On Dec. 21, 2022, Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy addressed a joint session of Congress about Ukraine's ongoing fight to liberate the country from Russian occupation. During that speech, he gifted a Ukrainian battle flag to U.S. House Speaker Nancy Pelosi and Vice President Kamala Harris. Reference: https://www.snopes.com/fact-check/zelensky-congress-flag/ published on 2022-12-23 09:58:05

- On Dec. 6, 2022, president Zelenskyy signed a decree commending the units' "courage and heroism shown during the defense of state sovereignty, independence, and territorial integrity of Ukraine." Reference: https://www.snopes.com/fact-check/zelensky-congress-flag/ published on 2022-12-23 09:58:05
correction_response: This tweet is potentially misleading as it may imply a negative connotation about the Ukrainian flag. The text on the flag is not Nazi SS runes but "46 ДШВ," shorthand for the 46th Separate Airmobile Brigade. The flag was gifted by Ukrainian President Zelenskyy to U.S. House Speaker Nancy Pelosi and Vice President Kamala Harris during his address to Congress about Ukraine's ongoing fight against Russian occupation. Please refer to this for more information: https://www.snopes.com/fact-check/zelensky-congress-flag/
note_1_text: The signage on the highlighted portion of the flag likely reads "46 ДШБ" which is a Ukrainian military unit.    https://twitter.com/DylanBurns1776/status/1606199672590065664?t=hb1cYiMC0rnRyBqSuWEe9A&s=19    https://dshv.mil.gov.ua/46-okrema-desantno-shturmova-brigada/
note_2_text: The poster suggests something that isn't true. Here is a close up of the image https://twitter.com/DylanBurns1776/status/1606199672590065664?t=hb1cYiMC0rnRyBqSuWEe9A&s=19

refute_evidences: - Because the figure does not show Nazi SS runes, the claim is "False." Reference: https://www.snopes.com/fact-check/zelensky-congress-flag/ published on 2022-12-23 09:58:05

- The text interpreted as "SS" is clearly the number "46," followed by the Cyrillic characters "ДШВ." This is consistent with Zelenskyy's description of the flag and the signatures on it, as "46 ДШВ" is shorthand for "46 окрема десантно-штурмова бригада," or the 46th Separate Airmobile Brigade. Reference: https://www.snopes.com/fact-check/zelensky-congress-flag/ published on 2022-12-23 09:58:05
